html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05072024-05-09PS, CBSA
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to transfer the authority to issue removal orders from the Immigration Division to the Minister's Delegate in three circumstances: (i) misrepresentation of visa-exempt status to obtain an electronic travel authorization; (ii) non-compliance with the requirement to undergo a medical examination, and (iii) non-compliance with the requirement to appear for examination at a designated port of entry.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0086 Publication Date: 2024-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to transfer the authority to issue removal orders from the Immigration Division to the Minister's Delegate in three circumstances: (i) misrepresentation of visa-exempt status to obtain an electronic travel authorization; (ii) non-compliance with the requirement to undergo a medical examination, and (iii) non-compliance with the requirement to appear for examination at a designated port of entry.
